content: @Yaël Dillies do you have plans for this one? I can try reviving it
You mustn't have been following the PR queue :stuck_out_tongue:
I PRed antichains, shadows, UV compressions, set.sized and finset.slice over the past three months. Now there's #11248 open

@Eric Rodriguez, @Mauricio Collares, #13149 is now merged. I just spent the morning cleaning up #2770 and it's looking quite good.

  • I have moved the material about initial segments to colex. We'll need to PR a deep clean before PRing the init_seg material.
  • There's two timeouts in kruskal_katona if you want to fix them.
  • I'm not sure what to do with set_family.basic.
the changes to colex are going to be super mega fun to deal with...
Probably it will be easiest to report the file.
